attributes.action: Get all school teachers and support staff VACCINATED.
attributes.additional_details:
Children are our future and at the moment they are being poorly treated. They are losing out on education and socialising with their friends and a routine which is good for them.
Parents wish to do their bit but teaching is a specialist occupation which needs to be carried out continuously in a child's life. Parents also have other duties such as running theme, working and so on.
This petition is to get teachers back into the classroom and doing the job they want to do, safely.
attributes.background: Treat teachers and support staff as key workers and get them vaccinated immediately.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
